text: 13:22 Godɨn Araziba 13:1-3; Akar Mogomem 13:13Gumazitaba izɨ ia gifar suam, ‘Kɨrara, God Gumazamiziba Ua Me Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim,’ o ‘kɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam,’ egh me mirakelɨn bar ekiaba ko dɨgavir kuram gamir arazibar amutɨ da otivam. Me kamaghɨn ifonge, me gumazamiziba bar me gifaraghtɨ, me onganigham. Egh me gavgavim ikɨ, uaghan God ua bagha mɨsevezir gumazamiziba, uaghan me gifarasa. Kamaghɨn me mirakelɨn kabar amuam. Egh dughiataba me me gifarɨsɨ damuva avegham.
